|ram1_num = |nvramsize = 64 |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = IEEE 802.3/3u |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = C0:C1:C0 |oui = C0:C1:C0 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = Speedboost |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = CyberTAN |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt, Tomato (Shibby) |availability = Discontinued |eoldate = 2015 |fccapprovdate = 01/07/2011 |estreldate = 04/04/2011 |reldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = N82E16833124413 |asin = B009PLCYKE |asin_country = |asin2 = B004T9RR0E |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "3763-11500101R" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :Example serial number: 10910C14183103 Many devices have Cisco logo and Cisco brand name above the model number which is "Linksys E1500" Only one version (v1) was ever made. ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=90346 New Linksys Router (E1200; E1500; E2500; E3200)] On the '''DD-WRT''' Forum *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=141030 e1500 Firmware] On the '''DD-WRT''' Forum *Supported by [http://tomato.groov.pl/download/K26RT-N/ K26RT-N] builds of Tomato by Shibby. :[http://svn.dd-wrt.com/changeset/18871 8MB Flash, 32MB RAM] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = ?K26 build 18946 20120407 :[https://forum.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Linksys_E1500 Install Guide] Please insert instructions here ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|notrecommended}} {{OpenWrtNotice|insufficient}} {{OpenWrtNotice|endsupport|2022|19.07.10}} {{OpenWrtNotice|broadcomwifi}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/linksys/linksys_e1500_v1 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 17.01.0 |current_supported_version = 22.03.5 |unsupportedfuncntions = [https://openwrt.org/unsupported/wifi_2.4ghz WiFi 2.4GHz] |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ===Flashing Tomato=== Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ DJ2 | 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | 5 |- | Vcc (3.3V) | TXD | RXD | NC | GND |} ====Serial Recovery==== {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- !
